metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16647 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Artifex MuPDF 1.13.0, the pdf_get_xref_entry function in pdf/pdf-xref.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault in fz_write_data in fitz/output.c) via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
